src:
Med vožnjo na avto padla skala
Tolminski policisti so primer zaključili z uradnim zaznamkom za zavarovalnico.
06 Nov 2019, 16:50 by A. L.
HUDAJUŽNA – Včeraj ob 6.48 so obravnavali prometno nesrečo med vasjo Hudajužna in Koritnico v Baški grapi na Tolminskem. »Po sedaj zbranih podatkih je voznica VW tiguana vozila proti Tolminu. Med vožnjo ji je z desne strani večji kamen padel na prednji pokrov motorja in ga poškodoval. Voznica ni bila poškodovana,« poroča PU Nova Gorica.Tolminski policisti so primer zaključili z uradnim zaznamkom za zavarovalnico.
text:
Rock fell on the car while driving
Tolmin police officers closed the case with an official endorsement for the insurance company.
06 Nov 2019, 15:50 by A.L.
HUDAJUŽNA - A traffic accident between the village of Hudajužna and Koritnica in Baška grapa, Tolmin, was discussed yesterday at 6.48. »According to the data collected now, a VW tiguan driver was driving toward Tolmin. While driving, a larger rock to her right fell on the front bonnet and damaged it. The ticket was not damaged, "Nova Gorica Police Department reports. Tolmin police officers closed the case with an official endorsement for the insurance company.
